organic.title: Re: EA Launcher doesn´t install in choosen directory
organic.snippet: Re: EA Launcher doesn´t install in choosen directory. Today, Origin finally forced me to upgrade to this app and I had the same annoying issue. After some research and fiddling around, I found a way to change the default install path by using a command line argument. If anyone wants to give it a try: Download the ...

organic.title: Games that won't download, install, or load in the EA app
organic.snippet: Go to C:\Program Files\Electronic Arts\EA Desktop\EA Desktop. Right-click on EADesktop.exe. Choose Run as Administrator. Start the download and pause it after 30 seconds. In C:\Program Files\EA Games, copy the content of the old folder for the game into the new folder for the game. Resume the download.

organic.title: Re: Sims 3 launcher keeps taking me back to EA App!! ...
organic.snippet: If you are having problems with the launcher downloads while using the EA app - try the following. 1. With the EA app open , click the three bars in the upper left. 2. Click settings. 3. click application.

organic.title: How to download, install, and update the EA app
organic.snippet: Restart or reset your download · On PC: By default, the EA app installation folder is at C:\Program Files\Electronic Arts\EA Desktop\EA Desktop.

organic.title: Launcher crashes when I open the downloads tab in Sims 3
organic.snippet: ... desktop. If it copies instead of moving, or you get an error when trying to move it, stop here and let me know. Otherwise, open the launcher to spawn a clean folder, download one Store item, install it, and see whether it works, both whether the launcher behaves and whether the content shows up in-game.

organic.title: Re: Sims 3 launcher won't open
organic.snippet: Re: Sims 3 launcher won't open. @Kiarah001 Please undo any changes you've made (i.e. compressing files). Try reinstalling DirectX 9. You don't need to uninstall anything; just download the installer from Microsoft and run it. https://www.microsoft.com/en-US/download/details.aspx?id=8109. Restart your computer ...

organic.title: My download is endlessly stuck on "preparing".
organic.snippet: My download is endlessly stuck on "preparing". I've tried everything, cleaning the cache, redownloading the EA app, updating it, repairing it, freeing up memory.
